Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1976...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1983, off Gregory Johnson (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1983, off Wilbur Morris (SYR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1985, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 3 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 4/22/1986...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 2/2/1989 to a 5-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 7/7/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1989, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against West Texas on 9/11/1989...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Diablo on 9/14/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1992, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
